Title: FG sets uniform prices for housing estate units
Summary: Federal Government has approved uniform sale prices for various housing units under its Renewed Hope Estate Programme . The housing units comprise one-, two-, and three-bedroom units .

Title: NiMet staff suspends strike as Keyamo intervenes
Summary: The planned strike by workers of the Nigerian Meteorological Agency (NiMet) has now been suspended . Minister of Aviation and Aerospace Development, Festus Keyamo, intervened .

Title: Court adjourns till Friday for Kanu to open defence after sacking lawyers
Summary: Court adjourns till Friday for Nnamdi Kanu to open defence after sacking lawyers . Kanu was scheduled to open his defence on Friday . Self-acclaimed leader of the proscribed separatist group, Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), has been stalled .

Title: Lafarge Africa’s 9M 2025 revenue hits N780.48b, up 63% year-on-year
Summary: Lafarge Africa Plc recorded sales revenue of N780.48 billion for the 2025 9M period . This is a 63 per cent increase compared to N479.49 billion in the previous year . Lafarge is a leading innovative and sustainable building solutions company .

Title: Seyi Tinubu meets Igbo business leaders to advance ‘Change Nigeria’ initiative
Summary: Seyi Tinubu met with a group of prominent young Igbo businessmen in Lagos . The Change Nigeria Initiative is part of efforts to strengthen the Change Nigeria initiative .

Title: ‎Super Eagles goalkeeper Ojo Olorunleke withdraws court case against wife
Summary: Super Eagles goalkeeper Ojo Olorunleke withdraws court case against wife . Ojo had filed for divorce because his wife publicly accused him of infidelity . He had earlier admitted to committing adultery in his petition .

Title: APC to ADC: Stop hallucinating about persecution, we do not silence opposition
Summary: APC to ADC: Stop hallucinating about persecution, we do not silence opposition . According to the APC, the ADC’s statement is the political equivalent of a mosquito accusing a lion of roaring too loudly .

Title: Varsity lecturer killed by ‘hit and run’ driver in Kogi
Summary: The Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) confirmed the killing of a female lecturer by a hit-and-run articulated vehicle in Kogi . The FRSC confirmed the death of the lecturer .

Title: Court fixes Friday for Nnamdi Kanu to open defence to FG’s terrorism charge
Summary: Court fixes Friday for Nnamdi Kanu to open defence to FG’s terrorism charge . Kanu had earlier sacked his legal team to prepare to personally represent himself . The case was adjourned to enable him to prepare for his defence proceedings .

Title: FG approves uniform prices for Renewed Hope Housing Units
Summary: The Federal Ministry of Housing and Urban Development has announced uniform sale prices for housing units under its Renewed Hope Estate Programme nationwide . The government has approved uniform prices for the housing units .
